name: Explosive Munitions
text: Exhaust this card when an Imperial figure declares a ranged attack. You may replace 1 die in the attack pool with 1 red die and the attack gains Blast 1

name: In the Shadows
text: Exhaust this card at the start of an activation and choose an Imperial figure. That figure becomes hidden.

name: Field Officer
text: Attachment - Guardian, Leader, or Trooper Only. Exhaust this card, you gain: => Order: Choose a friendly figure within 2 spaces. That figure may interrupt to perform a move.

name: Show of Force
text: Exhaust this card when an Imperial Figure declares an attack. That figure becomes Focused.

name: Strike Force
text: Attachment - While attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die.

name: Prey Upon Doubt
text: Exhaust this card when a Rebel figure declares an attack. The Rebel figure chooses to either suffer 1 strain or apply +1 surge cancel to the defense results.

name: Experimental Arms
text: Attachment - While attacking you may apply +1 Surge to the attack results. Then, after the attack is resolved, you suffer 1 damage.
